>
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6440) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 221 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=269)

**Prerequisites**
trained in martial weapons

</column>

---

You don't take the normal –2 penalty to attack rolls with [improvised weapons](/Rules.aspx?ID=2192). Improvised weapons you use have a minimum weapon damage die of 1d6, or 1d4 if the improvised weapon is [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526).

<title level="2">Weapon Improviser Dedication leads to...</title>
[Improvised Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=6443), [Improvised Pummel](/Feats.aspx?ID=6441), [Makeshift Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6444), [Surprise Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6442)
name: Weapon Improviser Dedication
